subject: Basketball
Playoff Games
lead_paragraph: LeBron James had 32 points and 15 rebounds as the Miami Heat beat the Indiana Pacers, 95-86, despite Chris Bosh leaving the game with an abdominal injury.
snippet: LeBron James had 32 points and 15 rebounds as the Miami Heat beat the Indiana Pacers, 95-86, despite Chris Bosh leaving the game with an abdominal injury.
